name: Chasing After the Light
description:
Chasing After the Light is the entry game for team Times Two for the Global Game Jam 2022. Try not to lose trail of the Light Rune. If you get away from it your sanity will be damaged to the maybe a point of no return. 

Use A / Left Arrow key to move left.

Use D / Right Arrow key to move right.

Use Space key to jump.
